name: Rescuing Orc
overview: How far would you go to help a friend? When your best friend Orc (an orc, coincidentally) didn't show up for tea after a couple of weeks, it was pretty clear something had happened to him. Armed with your trusty sword, enter the dangerous "World of Magica" where things are not always what they seem, including you: a goblin with good character! This is a mission to find what happened to your friend, starting deep in the Black Forest and exploring 5 different areas, from the perilous Rocky Mountains to the dark corridors of Bluestone Keep. The game is available on diskette, cassette and cartridge. Please visit Rescuing Orc at Poly Play online shop for further information. Collector's Edition features: 5.25" floppy disk MicroSD card including disk image for C64/PC/Mac, MP3 soundtrack and more Cardboard box with slipcase 8-page DIN A5 manual (English) Stickers Poster Shrink-wrapped
